remarks: Distribute a binary product of sums to a sum of binary products in a ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Mar-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumdixp as of 10-Jul-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumdixp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
gsumdixp.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
gsumdixp.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
gsumdixp.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
gsumdixp.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. W ) $.
gsumdixp.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
gsumdixp.x $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> X e. B ) $.
gsumdixp.y $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. J ) -> Y e. B ) $.
gsumdixpOLD.xf $e |- ( ph -> ( `' ( x e. I |-> X ) " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumdixpOLD.yf $e |- ( ph -> ( `' ( y e. J |-> Y ) " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumdixpOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( ( R gsum ( x e. I |-> X ) ) .x. ( R gsum ( y e. J |-> Y ) ) ) = ( R gsum ( x e. I , y e. J |-> ( X .x. Y ) ) ) ) $.
$d .x. x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d I x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d R x $.
$d X y $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x y $.
